member.name: T:Business.RequestHandlers.Managers.DefaultValueManager
member.summary: This class returns all the modules, their name and uuid information. It also returns of the default values for all the modules. It integrates with module parser to parse a proto file, recieves all the default values from default.toml and receives the module.proto from corresponding module name and uuid folder.

member.name: M:Business.RequestHandlers.Managers.GitRepositoryManager.GetFileDataFromTagAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This method returns a filedata as string from a particular tag. If a tag is "1.0.7", then the method returns data from all the files for a particular tag.

member.summary: Checks a GIT tree to see if a file exists

member.name: M:Business.RequestHandlers.Managers.GitRepositoryManager.IsExistsContentRepositoryDirectory
member.summary: This method checks whether a folder exists in a local directory and if there is ".git" sub folder within the same.
member.returns: true: if a folder and ".git" folder is present. false: if a folder and ".git" folder isn't present.

member.name: M:Business.RequestHandlers.Managers.GitRepositoryManager.CheckForGitSubDir(System.String)
member.summary: Helper function to check whether the ".git" folder exists in a repository folder.

member.name: M:Business.RequestHandlers.Managers.GitRepositoryManager.DeleteReadOnlyDirectory(System.String)
member.summary: Recursively deletes a directory as well as any subdirectories and files. If the files are read-only, they are flagged as normal and then deleted.
member.param: The name of the directory to remove.
